snippet: In a video interview recorded before his death last week, a convicted Nazi war criminal said the execution of hundreds of Italians by his unit in 1944 was “a terrible thing for us to have to do.”
abstract: In a video interview recorded before his death last week, a convicted Nazi war criminal said the execution of hundreds of Italians by his unit in 1944 was “a terrible thing for us to have to do.”

headline.main: Executing Italian Civilians Was 'Terrible' for Executioners, Nazi Said Before Death

keywords.name: subject
keywords.value: War Crimes, Genocide and Crimes Against Humanity
